content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or preferences, but here are a few restaurants and cafes in Chippenham that offer some of the dishes mentioned:

1. The Garden Café - This popular café is located in the beautiful grounds of the Grade I-listed buildings at Lackham House and serves a range of salads, sandwiches, and cream teas using locally sourced ingredients.

2. The Bell House Hotel - This historic hotel in the town center offers a variety of seasonal dishes, including fish and chips, cheese and onion pie, and BBQ pulled pork, as well as a range of salads and sandwiches.

3. The Garden Room Restaurant - Located at Stanton Manor, this restaurant offers a seasonal menu that includes a variety of dishes featuring locally sourced produce, such as Wiltshire beef and cheese.

4. The Yew Tree Inn - This traditional country pub is located just outside of Chippenham and offers a range of traditional pub dishes, as well as a variety of local ales and ciders.

These are just a few options, but there are many other great places to eat in Chippenham, including local farmers' markets and food festivals that offer a range of delicious seasonal dishes from local vendors.
